item.title: MambaAD: Exploring State Space Models for Multi-class Unsupervised Anomaly Detection
item.description: MambaAD: Linear-complexity multi-class unsupervised anomaly detection using a novel Mamba-based decoder with Locality-Enhanced State Space modules.
